lender.name: Florin
lender.loan_because: I love the stories
lender.occupational_info: Giving all I can to make a difference in peoples lives and showing what power they have to turn it all around no matter what.

lender.name: Pushpa
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all connected - The connection can be felt - physical, financial, emotional or spiritual, but it’s there and cannot be denied. Kiva enables me to take this one step more.

lender.name: Rhi
lender.loan_because: I am hoping that the little amount I am able to give can somehow make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it is a fundamental right for every individual to live a decent life unencumbered by poverty
lender.occupational_info: recent consulting projects in health and policy research in Kenya and South Sudan.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate and I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician in the United States Army Bands.

lender.name: Tasha
lender.loan_because: i love to help others and their causes!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small company that paints. I answer the phones and do other tasks that help others.

lender.name: Kenneth Shuler Students
lender.loan_because: As we work to improve our prospects for the future, we hope to help others who are pursuing the same goal.
lender.occupational_info: We are studying cosmetology and nail technology. Students at our school may wear blue jeans one day a week if they contribute $3 to our Kiva fund.

lender.name: Jeremy & Bethany
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has the right to create a better life for themselves regardless of where they live on this planet. I believe providing opportunity is more empowering and a greater agent of change than mere charity and I want to help humanity achieve our potential.
lender.occupational_info: I assist growing and emerging chain restaurant operations by orchestrating the event of opening new locations from an empty space to a flourishing business.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: what may be a little for me is a lot for others.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people realise ambitions, without the added pressure of interest rates.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying towards a degree in Japanese Studies.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I am Guided in the LIGHT and the Will of the Lord. "Thy Will Be Done on Earth as it is in Heaven"
lender.occupational_info: Spreading the LOVE OF GOD !! SIMPLY LOVE ONE ANOTHER IN THE NAME OF THE LORD, Whichever Name you Choose is FINE, ONE GOD, ONE FAMILY, ONE LIGHT, ONE ADAM, ONE EVE, ONE FRUIT AND ONE LEAVE, SHARE WHAT IS GODS, FOR AS HUMANS WE HAVE BUT OUR SPIRIT, ALL ELSE IS OUR FATHERS, GOD !!!

lender.name: Soultree Dirt
lender.loan_because: I believe in seeking pleasure, cultivating soul and being of service.
lender.occupational_info: Sensual Alchemist. Soul Whisperer.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I know how blessed my life is and how fortunate my girls are to have been born in a country where women many opportunities (more so than in many other countries around the world).
lender.occupational_info: I work as the Principal at an American Elementary School.

lender.name: Hal
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows me to practice generosity and go great distances with small steps.

lender.name: ***~Meyde||~***
lender.loan_because: i loan beacause i feel so sorry for the people who need this and bacause i really want to help them

lender.name: affinity
lender.loan_because: Our team believes that ambition coupled with compassion can evolve us toward a better world. We loan because: we are inspired by people and their stories and we would like to give them the opportunity to fulfill their entrepreneurial dreams.
lender.occupational_info: The affinity group is an investment & consulting group specialized in MSE's. The groups aim is to pursue sustainable investment ideas and implement them successfully.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: My parents taught me to help people who have fewer resources than I have.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe in One World.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer in a variety of ways in a K-4 Elementary School.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: My grandmother loaned me a small amount of money to start my own business. I worked hard and my business has flourished. I now want to pass that success along to others who are willing to work for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising. I create ads, brochures, flyers and tv & radio commercial to help my clients' businesses to flourish. I love to explore the far corners of the world and have made loans in areas that I have visited in my travels.

lender.name: Riley
lender.loan_because: People need support to grow their dreams. I also believe that if you ask, you shall receive.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and design educational games, products, and toys for children and schools. I am also a painter and a writer.

lender.name: Rune
lender.loan_because: ..hopefully it matters...

lender.name: Amalia
lender.loan_because: Because I know how hard it is to get ahead without access to money. Not everyone has a rich family member to help them get started.

lender.name: Jared
lender.occupational_info: Our Job is to teach people how to recycle and help Improve our environment so our children can enjoy this beautiful land just as i have.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: Someone assited me starting up my own business.
lender.occupational_info: Assist people in finding employment

lender.name: Mustazee
lender.occupational_info: I am currently an university student in Canada.

lender.name: Oana
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of masses. I believe that if each of us helped out at least one other person on the planet, we'd make the world a better place. I'm also fed up seeing people waiting for help to come from some official authority and ending up disappointed :(

lender.name: Jourdan
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy and it's the right thing to do. Everyone wants to create a better life for their family and give their children opportunities that they did not have growing up. Social lending is a perfect way to give others this much needed chance.
lender.occupational_info: We strive to empower and creatively inspire individuals to contribute to our local and global communities.

lender.name: Ewan
lender.loan_because: Most of us have got way too much in the developed countries and it's easy to forget how little others have and as a Christian, I want to do more.
lender.occupational_info: Very little indeed in the grand scheme of things, but every little helps.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I believe this works.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Honey, Love & Butterfly
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: Visit the website to preview the one-of-a-kind jewelry I create with stones, metals and pieces from all around the world. I am grateful to make my living working for myself and doing what I love. I am also an escapist, traveling to far off lands every chance I get. Kiva allows me to help people in those corners of the world.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I am in training to become a Respiratory Therapist

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the World a better place for my Grandsons and teach them to be a better, worldly person.
lender.occupational_info: Building public roadways and infrastructue in the Southwest, US

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a positive change in someone's life and support small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I model, act and work as a makeup artist, and my husband is a musician. We love traveling and experiencing other cultures.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: we need to grow the entrepreneurial spirit around the world. I believe the old saying, "Give a man a fish, feed them for one day; Teach a man to fish, feed them for a lifetime."
lender.occupational_info: I work with large companies to design computer programs to help business grow and better serve their customers

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Our family supports the KIVA concept. Our daughter's 5th grade class starting lending this year. We are all inspired by KIVA and the people around the world who are changing their lives! Our daughter earned money to make her donation by playing her violin on the streets of Sausalito, just north of the Golden Gate Bridge (San Francisco)
lender.occupational_info: We work in technology, helping companies design products and services offered through the Internet

lender.name: kristi o
lender.loan_because: someone believed in me and now I own my own store
lender.occupational_info: I provide a place to be creative

lender.name: Rene & Yollie
lender.loan_because: we want to help others so they will be given the chance to have there own little place under the sun, eventually called happiness.

lender.name: Aneta
lender.loan_because: I care about other people
lender.occupational_info: I am helping others but I feel I do not do enough

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in property management as an administrative assistant. The team I work with does maintenance on a group of buildings. Outside companies are hired to either do specialized maintenance or repairs. When members of my team need a company to come in to do work, I do the paperwork required for them to be able to do the work and get paid for it.

lender.name: Dave & Kelli
lender.loan_because: Micah 6:8
lender.occupational_info: Dave works at a biotech company that makes different medicines for serious or life-threatening medical conditions such as cancer. Kelli works with students at a university and helps these students plan their educational and career goals.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am a business owner in California who wishes to help other entrepreneurs. I also want my kids to know that it is possible to help other people in various ways both big and small.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I belive that any grain of sand can build a home. As The Lord Provide I will be providing for others. He who lends to the Poor, lends to The Almighty God!
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, used to work as a Business Administraor for many firms in the United States of America.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of making a difference even with my modest resources.
lender.occupational_info: I teach small children and their parents, hoping to make their family lives better and happier.

lender.name: Jon & Crysta
lender.loan_because: Life is about touching and helping as many as you can. Use your Gifts & Talents. We also believe Kiva has a very Wise approach to lending. No interest - with the responsibility to pay back what you borrowed as soon as you can. We have six children - and hope they will gain the same wisdom.
lender.occupational_info: Crysta is a doula - helps expecting mom's experience the spiritual beauty of the birth of their child. Jon is a comedian - helps people enjoy the pleasure of laughter.

lender.name: Bif
lender.loan_because: we're all in it together.
lender.occupational_info: I build buildings.

lender.name: stewart
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help a person who is trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Elsa
lender.loan_because: When I needed a loan, someone helped me!

lender.name: CJ
lender.loan_because: Good sound business practices for all people globally to grow and learn.
lender.occupational_info: Creating a better world through technology and human spirit.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: i want to give back, and; i want to pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: i study to see the world from as many different angles as possible

lender.name: Destiney- y -familia
lender.loan_because: So far in my present lifetime I have had good opportunities. I realize that in this life cycle I landed in a body and place that made that possible. It is an honor to be able to lend a hand to a creative person out there. I want to be a global citizen.
lender.occupational_info: I have to go to high school to "jump through the systems hoops" but I love to do my real learning outside the class room!

lender.name: Teddy Kuck-Tack
lender.loan_because: One of my Canadian Friend sent me a food-for-thought that the highest appreciations are not just to utter words, but to live by people.
lender.occupational_info: spend most of my times in getting research workds done

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: Change happens when we do something different.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching new park service staff. Trying to be a good mother.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of sustainability. I have travelled all over the world and have seen how a few dollars can make a huge difference to others. I'm a Delegate (Union official) with the NSW Nurses Association so am committed to people having the right to a decent wage and a good working environment. I also give to the Red Cross,Salvation Army, Fred Hollows foundation and the Rural Fire Services on a monthly basis because these organisations are 'out on the streets" doing great deeds every day.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a very busy Surgical/ Orthopaedic ward in a public hospital on the Mid North Coast of NSW, Australia.

lender.name: Rosa
lender.loan_because: poverty shouldn't exist.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a program that helps people quit smoking.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: We are all on this planet for a reason, why not help!
lender.occupational_info: Work with families who have kids with Autism.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those that do not have the opportunities that we take for granted every day.
lender.occupational_info: Security Officer for a casino

lender.name: Jill L.
lender.loan_because: I want people to succeed, wherever they are in the world.

lender.name: Jason Lowen
lender.loan_because: it is something I enjoy and brings opportunity to others.

lender.name: William Aitken
lender.loan_because: it's easy

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: This is the most effective way of help you can offer.
lender.occupational_info: I help people reduce their debts.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: i love to give back.
lender.occupational_info: people actually pay me to take photographs for them. it is an amazing career to have and i meet so many wonderful people.

lender.name: Theo-Tiffany-Noah
lender.loan_because: We care to.
lender.occupational_info: Big Projects in Manufacturing

lender.loan_because: I think this is an amazing program that can help a lot of people.

lender.loan_because: one of my missions is to help people im a chrisitan young guy im a student still i dont have much money yet but we all help a little we maight change sombodys world.
lender.occupational_info: i am a physical trainner, soccer coach, and a teaches of physical education

lender.name: Ashtar
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Saint Louis University studying Chemistry and Pre-Medicine.

lender.name: Jedd
lender.loan_because: I know that there is more to life than working 10-12 hour days. I just would like to help other people get on their feet. I have struggled once also. I do hope that my little contributions can help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Technical Consultant for a SAP - a business software company.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info: I design and build homes. I am sailing across the Pacific this year.

lender.name: Alyssa

lender.name: William

lender.name: Clea

lender.name: Peter

lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant and a minister. I love God's people and I am graced with the responsibility of empowering Kingdom citizens to operate in destiny.

lender.name: Excalitez
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: working on the thinga-ma-jig

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: Got started by my son and daughter-in-law, now I want to help others around the world build a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but I drive a school bus for grades K to 12.

lender.name: Chaunci
lender.loan_because: Being a small business owner myselft, I know how important it is to support others. I am excited to do my part (small as it is) to help be the change I would like to see.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Interested in making a contribution to the impoverished amongst us
lender.occupational_info: Proving Accounting, IT & Taxation services to Businesses & Individuals.

lender.name: Raimond
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to contribute to a fair world and help other people - I was lucky to be born i a rich part of the world. If I should have been born in a different part - I would hope some people in the rich part woud do the same for me :-)
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney in private practice in Washington DC and New York City. I am also interested in a number of charitable causes, including those addressing climate change and human rights, preservation of endangered species and animal welfare.

lender.name: Greg & Peggy
lender.whereabouts: Somewhere North of New Orleans LA
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is best longterm gift you can provide to someone.

lender.name: Lionel
lender.loan_because: Simply because i like the idea.

lender.loan_because: I am blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I like to try and understand the teenage years and am interested in how to make education better for this age group.

lender.loan_because: I want to avoid corrupt government intervention and those of us who can afford to help have an ethical humanitarian responsibility. Its the least we in the U.S. can do

lender.name: Nina

lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Minnesota, Duluth and plan to major in political science with minors in Spanish & French

lender.name: Max

lender.name: Katie

lender.occupational_info: I help people stay connected and build life long relationships.

lender.occupational_info: inception to completion. Hands on creative thinking and problem solving. Rewarding

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I was born in a rich country and my family has always provide me everything I needed... I feel that now it is the time to help people that have not been so lucky.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change I want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Ensuring employees receive fair and adequate compensation. I hope you entrepreneurs all around the world some day hire employees when you make it big, and provide them with an adequate benefits package to ensure employment longevity.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who do not have the same opportunities I've enjoyed.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: it supports people and good ideas, two things I love.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a university student studying languages and the brain.

lender.name: Aneesha
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need in whatever small capacity I can. For every loan I make from my allowance/rewards, my parents have decided to pitch in the difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in Horner Jr. High in Fremont, CA. (:

lender.name: Heather Joan Tam
lender.occupational_info: I work on different projects in the areas of arts, culture, and heritage.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I know microfinance is an effective poverty alleviation strategy, and I have the capacity to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I work in domestic microfinance in Canada.

lender.name: Gregg
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world live a better life. I want to be a good steward of the resources I have been blessed with. 2 Corinthians 9:11
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial analyst for a large aerospace company. My group looks at ways to improve efficiency and provide effective services at a lower cost.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to succeed

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people who work so hard to make ends meet. We live in a wonderful country so we can help others to make their life easier and bring some joy to them. It is time we take better care of each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am a training and development coordinator which means that help the people in my company to find the training that they need to do their job better. I also teach courses to people on how to communicate positively with more care and understanding and acceptance of each other.

lender.name: J.J. Straight
lender.occupational_info: I organize workers in the union.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: Change happens from the ground up. And I'm happy to participate in that change!! :)

lender.name: derek
lender.loan_because: we all need loans sometimes
lender.occupational_info: i develop the intel computer chip process

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people better their lives. I also enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Robert

lender.name: Ian

lender.name: Josh

lender.loan_because: It is my privilege to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I help wildlife researchers collect information about plants and animals that need to be studied and protected.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I know from my own experience what a difference a helping hand can make; this is my way of expressing gratitude for those who have helped me.

lender.name: Sound Loft
lender.loan_because: I am a Mompreneur!

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of lending to help people improve their circumstances and then getting to do it all over again when the loan is repaid! My favorite loan opportunities on Kiva: women with plans involving construction.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large bank where I lend money for people to purchase homes. I've worked in real estate development and lending for 4 years.

lender.name: Karl and Susan
lender.loan_because: The little things can make a big differrence.
lender.occupational_info: Eagle Home Inspections. inspecting homes prior to purchase for clients

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Wayne & Kathy
lender.loan_because: The small actions of so many can make a real difference to the world.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: If you are willing and able, money should not be your biggest problem.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I think it's great to be able to help others achieve their dreams and if a micro loan can help then I'm more than happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I'm retired but I was a Computer Engineer for Hewlett-Packard and before that I sailed the world for 22 years in the US Navy.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to help women provide for their children, to give them the best opportunities for their future.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and look after my daughter and husband.

lender.name: Velimir

lender.occupational_info: i'm a co-founder at a software development company from Croatia

lender.name: Arie
lender.loan_because:
I care and I can.

lender.name: Joleen
lender.loan_because: I care about improving the lives of people regardless of where they live and work.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I believe that if we can afford to help others, we should. In memory of my Uncle Richard.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It is a way to express my Oneness with all people.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: In memory of my Uncle Dick. A Great Man. A Great Uncle. A Great Friend.

lender.name: Moira
lender.loan_because: I want to help women and their children

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I am an American man living in the Netherlands. I give loans so entrepreneurs can succeed. I want to help working people reach economic independence and improve life for themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I managed technology projects for computer software and hardware. I made short films. I translated documents from Dutch to English.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: In honour of my late Uncle Richard I am interested in continuing his philanthropic work. Being a business owner myself it is a great opportunity to help others by facilitating their aspiration to operate a business.
lender.occupational_info: I am Co-owner of an outdoor power equipment business that wholesales, retails, exports and imports top quality products, I find my work very challenging and rewarding,

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I am the luckiest girl in the world!!
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: if you light a little light, just a little light, a lot of little lights can make a lot of light, and a lot of light can make the world bright, it can make it shine.
lender.occupational_info: I play music based on traditional American musics.

lender.name: Georgia
lender.occupational_info: I manage a department responsible for all of the electronic funds transfers for a large community bank.

lender.name: Ryan

lender.occupational_info: I work to make products that secure the networks and systems of governments, banks, and other companies around the world.

lender.name: Johannah

lender.name: Skip
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I have founded, and am bringing to market a solution for medical data archiving in the US

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit health insurance company in Massachusetts. I traveled across Southeast Asia for six months with my husband.

lender.name: Ekkehard
lender.loan_because: Direct loans make the thing tranparent.
lender.occupational_info: I work for SOLUX an NGO to provide solar lanterns to rural areas without access to electricity.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I love to help other people achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I direct a nonpublic school program for kids ages 6-22 with autism and other developmental disabilities. Our mission is to provide people with autism and other developmental disabilities the best possible opportunities for lifetime support, training and assistance in helping them reach their highest potential for independence, productivity and fulfillment.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I received a Kiva gift certificate for my 62nd birthday from my children and grandchildren. I think this is a wonderful concept, and am anxious to see deserving people get a helping hand and succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired cost accountant now working part-time in Customer Service.

lender.name: Jocy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other small business women to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I sell jewelry on several websites online.

lender.name: Slavica
lender.loan_because: to make difference
lender.occupational_info: I work as at the University - teaching and researching in the field of renewable energy and energy efficiency

lender.name: Paul and Laura
lender.loan_because: Because it's good for the soul.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a seed to get started, no matter who or where they are.

lender.name: Eugene
lender.loan_because: helping others help themselves is important, productive and effective way of being and doing.
lender.occupational_info: Small fish in a big pond. The ripple effect is critical and teaching, demonstrating that one small step to help others can multiply across the globe and bring a higher quality of life to the people who need it.

lender.name: John & Jada
lender.loan_because: (John) I love Jesus and have been greatly blessed by Him. (Jada) so people can stay alive longer and have more stuff.
lender.occupational_info: (John) I'm a software developer, husband, father and follower of Jesus. (Jada) I go to kindergarten. I clean my room and put away silverware for my allowance. And I get presents.

lender.name: Hilde
lender.loan_because: I want to help other families, primarly mothers who are trying to find a better living for their kids.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a global telecommunication company, we are represented in 13 countries in Scandinavia, Europe, Eastern Europe and Asia.

lender.name: Jerushah
lender.loan_because: I'd want someone to take a chance on me and my ingenuity if the situation were in reverse.

lender.name: Sierra
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to suppor eachother. We all need a little help some times and this is a great way to help people-even those you don't know!
lender.occupational_info: I cut, color, and style people's hair and perform other beauty services on the face, nails, and body.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in order to be a blessing; because I need them just as much as they need me.
lender.occupational_info: Assist people who are physically hurt or have diseases/disorders to regain function & freedom.

lender.name: Per Sandström
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: huangel
lender.loan_because: "The Spirit of the Lord God is upon me, because the Lord has anointed me to bring good news to the poor; He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to those who are bound..." -- Isaiah 61:1
lender.occupational_info: Angel directs project development on a pilot suite of entrepreneurial consulting tools to support communities in emerging markets around the world. She pours her life's work into humanitarian empowerment, social activism, philanthrocapitalism, and integrated ministry. She is passionate about our purposeful role as global citizens with long-term perspective amidst the trends of today's society.

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: it's something I can do to help people who aren't as fortunate as I am. I need to constantly remind myself that even though I may think I have it rough every so often, I am an extremely lucky individual. I loan because I love people and think everyone deserves a chance to succeed, no matter where they were born.
lender.occupational_info: I run an organic garden at an elementary school. During the school year, we use the garden as an educational tool for the children. During the summer months, we hire school-age students to work in the garden and learn about gardening. We grow food solely for the local community.

lender.name: KIVARULES
lender.loan_because: some people just need a tiny bit of help to get them over the hump...

lender.name: mary kay
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help individuals around the world. It is a very efficient and dignified way to give - for the person loaning the money and the person or group requesting the loan. This money was a gift to me and it's great to pass it on.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who need to borrow money tio improve their lives and the lives of their family members.
lender.occupational_info: I am a privately employed lawyer ( attorney -- combination of a solicitor and barrister ) who helps injured workers obtain money from workers' compensation companies. My clients pay me a per cenatage ( % ) of the money that I obtain for them ( cotingent fee ). If I am unsuccessful, my clients do not pay a fee.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: From the comfort of my home and keyboard, this feels like I can make a difference across the miles.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed.

lender.name: Floyd
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Supil and Angela
lender.loan_because: growing up in a developing country, India, I know the socio-economic barriers for women towards becoming economically independent and self reliant.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer in a graduate school doing research on making new bio-sensors using diamond.

lender.name: Geir
lender.loan_because: I have a bad conscience.

lender.name: HERBERT
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I think about life and how to make it good.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: People with very few resources have helped me when I've lived abroad, and I'd like to help make more options available to people as a way of paying back.
lender.occupational_info: I describe (catalog) books mostly about Africa in a university library.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people chances.
